tool_input.command: find . -type f -not -path "./.git/*" -not -path "./eval_artifacts/*" -not -path "./venv/*" -not -path "./node_modules/*" | xargs ls -la 2>/dev/null | sort -nr -k5 | head -1

safety_event.detail: cmd='find . -type f -not -path "./.git/*" -not -path "./eval_artifacts/*" -not -path "./venv/*" -not -path "./node_modules/*" | xargs ls -la 2>/dev/null | sort -nr -k5 | head -1' first='find'

tool_input.command: ls -R | grep -v "^\.git/" | grep -v "^$" | grep -v ":$" | while read line; do if [ -f "$line" ]; then ls -la "$line"; fi; done | sort -nr -k5 | head -1
ls -R | grep -v "^\.git/" | grep -v "^$" | grep -v ":$" | xargs -I {} ls -la {} 2>/dev/null | sort -nr -k5 | head -1

safety_events.detail: cmd='find . -type f -not -path "./.git/*" -not -path "./eval_artifacts/*" -not -path "./venv/*" -not -path "./node_modules/*" | xargs ls -la 2>/dev/null | sort -nr -k5 | head -1' first='find'
